title: ADIFF 2015 - Ben & Ara (Q&A After Screening)
desc: (NEW YORK PREMIERE)?A story about an agnostic man and an African muslim woman who fall in love but grapple with differences in their core beliefs and lifestyle choices. They discover that when two cultures touch each other, the consequences can be magical and tragic. Directed by ?Nnegest Likk?,?USA, 2015, 87min, romantic drama English
